allow:
Bash(echo "To deploy this project to Vercel:

1. Run: vercel login
   - This will open your browser
   - Login with your Vercel account (or create one)
   
2. After logging in, run: vercel
   - Follow the prompts
   - Select ''Create new project'' if asked
   - Choose a project name
   - Confirm the detected Next.js framework
   
3. The deployment will start automatically

Alternatively, if you have a Vercel token:
vercel --token YOUR_TOKEN_HERE")
